title: Subsurface Threat Assessment
description: A naval operator must assess an unidentified subsurface contact detected by sonar to determine if it is a hostile submarine.

tasks.description: Analyze the acoustic signature of the subsurface contact.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator correctly analyzes the sonar data.

tasks.description: Compare the signature against a database of known friendly, neutral, and hostile submarine classes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator finds a potential match with a known adversary submarine class.

tasks.description: Recommend deploying a maritime patrol aircraft to gain secondary confirmation of the contact.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator makes a timely and appropriate recommendation for further action.
